name: Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation and up to 20 hours of battery life.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: A waterproof fitness watch with heart rate monitoring, GPS, and sleep tracking features.

description: Rechargeable electric toothbrush with multiple cleaning modes and a two-minute timer.

description: High-performance gaming laptop with a 15.6-inch display, 16GB RAM, and 1TB SSD.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with deep bass, 12 hours of battery life, and waterproof design.
